trans-unit.source: How to: Attach an empty disk
trans-unit.target: How to: Attach an empty disk

trans-unit.source: Attaching an empty disk is the simpler way to add a data disk, because Azure creates the .vhd file for you and stores it in the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Attaching an empty disk is the simpler way to add a data disk, because Azure creates the .vhd file for you and stores it in the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Click **Virtual Machines**, and then select the appropriate virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Click **Virtual Machines**, and then select the appropriate virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: On the command bar, click **Attach**, and then click **Attach Empty Disk**.
trans-unit.target: On the command bar, click **Attach**, and then click **Attach Empty Disk**.

trans-unit.source: The **Attach an Empty Disk** dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The **Attach an Empty Disk** dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: After the data disk is created and attached, it's listed in the dashboard of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: After the data disk is created and attached, it's listed in the dashboard of the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: How to: Attach an existing disk
trans-unit.target: How to: Attach an existing disk

trans-unit.source: Attaching an existing disk requires that you have a .vhd available in a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Attaching an existing disk requires that you have a .vhd available in a storage account.

trans-unit.source: Use the [Add-AzureVhd](http://go.microsoft.com/FWLink/p/?LinkID=391684) cmdlet to upload the .vhd file to the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Use the [Add-AzureVhd](http://go.microsoft.com/FWLink/p/?LinkID=391684) cmdlet to upload the .vhd file to the storage account.

trans-unit.source: After you've created and uploaded the .vhd file, you can attach it to a virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: After you've created and uploaded the .vhd file, you can attach it to a virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Click **Virtual Machines**, and then select the appropriate virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Click **Virtual Machines**, and then select the appropriate virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: On the command bar, click **Attach**, and then select **Attach Disk**.
trans-unit.target: On the command bar, click **Attach**, and then select **Attach Disk**.

trans-unit.source: Select the data disk that you want to attach to the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Select the data disk that you want to attach to the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Click the check mark to attach the data disk to the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Click the check mark to attach the data disk to the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: After the data disk is attached, it's listed in the dashboard of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: After the data disk is attached, it's listed in the dashboard of the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: After you add a data disk, you'll need to log on to the virtual machine and initialize the disk so the virtual machine can use the disk for storage.
trans-unit.target: After you add a data disk, you'll need to log on to the virtual machine and initialize the disk so the virtual machine can use the disk for storage.
